posts.post_content:
In find it interesting that the "As long as you have 30 or more life" clause is still being used.
  
   
[Chalice of Life](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chalice of Life) uses an "If you have 10 or more life than your starting life total"
  
   
It was designed with this in mind, probaly for EDH with [Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter)

Posted By: Sel3l3e (4/23/2013 2:40:51 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This guy is very resistant to removal. He has got a hardy 4 toughness which makes him burn resistant, and cant be targeted by [Oblivion Ring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oblivion Ring) or [Murder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Murder). Plus he has lifelink which can add up.  
  
The last ability is quite win more, but it can finish off games on an already super efficient creature.  
  
4.5/5
posts.html:
This guy is very resistant to removal. He has got a hardy 4 toughness which makes him burn resistant, and cant be targeted by Oblivion Ring or Murder. Plus he has lifelink which can add up.

The last ability is quite win more, but it can finish off games on an already super efficient creature.

4.5/5
